name: THE VOID (itch) (Flin)
description:
THE VOID is a video game that I made in 2 days for the DEV ATLAS game jam where the theme was ONLY ONE LIGHT SOURCE

Description: In THE VOID you must save a world from darkness by expanding your light

Controls: WASD to move and ARROW KEYS for sword

Credits:
me :) https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7cs1axDq7yBVm5prsqk5Ww
